name: Runs Vas Cagastalan
description: Rans Vas Cagastalan is my first ever game,  made with RPG maker 2003, in this mysterious world explore an island as you play as Bluez a character you'll grow to know more the more you play and react with characters, many secrets are set into this land they call Runs Vas Cagastalan {placeholder} or Cagastalan you will find characters that hold interesting backstories and also many more in the future, hope yall have fun with the demo
